attributes.action: Make punishable stealing puppies and dogs the same as human abduction!
attributes.additional_details:
Dogs and puppies are the hard work of their owners, they are working companions, they are family members, they are life support (guide dogs) (epilepsy dogs) owners put their hard work, time, effort and money into their dogs.
Dog are more importantly family members, dogs help make a family home, filling it with unconditional love, laughter and companionship.
The theft of dogs destroy families, it destroys people’s lives and stresses out the dogs and puppies. It must stop, with harsher punishment.
attributes.background: Make the theft of dogs and puppies punishable the same as human abduction.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216
